directions: Place the milk, butter, bananas, flour, sugar, salt, cinnamon, and yeast in the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Select Basic setting; press Start.  If your machine has a Fruit/Nut setting, add the raisins and walnuts at the signal, or around 5 minutes before the kneading cycle has finished.
ingredients: 2 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast or bread machine yeast
title: Oz's Banana-Nut and Raisin Bread for ABM
